BookingAppointmentDateTime.title: BookingAppointmentDateTime
BookingAppointmentDateTime.description: This is the Test Drive Booking Appoint Date Time Customer has suggested.

CustomerPhone.title: CustomerPhone
CustomerPhone.description: This is the 10 Digits Mobile number provided by Customer or end user.

customerEmail.title: customerEmail
customerEmail.description: This is the email address provided by Customer or end user.

customerMessage.title: customerMessage
customerMessage.description: This is special request asked by customer for test drive booking.

prefferedTimeSlot.title: prefferedTimeSlot
prefferedTimeSlot.description: This is the booking date time suggested by customer or end user.

vehicleSpecification.title: vehicleSpecification
vehicleSpecification.description: Vehicle Specification provide by Customer. For example Vehicle Model Name, Petrol or Diesel variant and Model Year etc.
